name: Chosen Foods 100% Avocado Oil-Based Classic Mayonnaise, Gluten & Dairy Free, Low-Carb, Keto Diet Friendly, Mayo for Sandwiches, Dressings and Sauces (11.25 floz 6 Pack)
short_description: 100% pure: Chosen Foods Avocado Oil Mayo is 100% avocado oil-based, never diluted, delicious, and full of good fats from avocados that were ripened to perfection.

Good Fats from Avocados: At Chosen Foods we are all-in on avocados! A wholesome, delicious superfood. Avocados are one of the world’s most nourishing nutrition-packed foods, thanks to its antioxidants from Vitamin E and monosaturated fats.

Versatile: Endless clean eating opportunities. Spread on your favorite sandwiches, burgers, or wraps. Whip up a coleslaw or potato salad. Mix it up and use as a base for your favorite zesty dip, marinade, or salad dressing.
All-Natural: Our avocado oil-based classic mayo is all natural, wholesome, and delicious for a paleo, keto, or clean-eating lifestyle. Certified kosher, non-GMO and free of soy canola and other oils.
Smooth and Creamy: Made with 100% pure avocado oil, cage-free eggs, organic vinegar, organic mustard, and spices, it’s rich and slightly tangy—perfect for everyday use.

name: Kraft Mayo with Avocado Oil Reduced Fat Mayonnaise - Classic Creamy Condiment for Sandwiches and Salads, Made with Cage-Free Eggs, For a Keto and Low Carb Lifestyle, 30 fl oz Jar
short_description: One 30 oz jar of Kraft Avocado Oil Mayonnaise
Kraft Avocado Oil Mayonnaise is reduced fat
Flavorful avocado mayo is ideal as a sandwich dressing or addition to recipes
Our thick and creamy, multi-use mayo comes ready to spread or stir into foods
Contains less fat than regular mayonnaise and 45 calories per serving plus 232 mg. of omega-3 ALA
Adds savory flavor to chicken or tuna salad, pasta salad, potato salad, coleslaw and more
Conveniently comes in a jar with a resealable cap
product_description: Kraft Avocado Oil Mayonnaise offers the delicious taste of mayo made with avocado oil for a flavorful and creamy condiment option. Our mayo has a light, velvety texture and rich flavor that elevates your favorite recipes. Ready to use straight from the jar, you can spread Kraft avocado mayo on your favorite sandwiches, add it to potato salad for extra creaminess, or get creative by making your own spicy mayo dipping sauce, garlic aioli or chipotle mayo. Made with cage-free whole eggs, our reduced fat mayo delivers on flavor while supplying 232 milligrams of omega-3 ALA. Kraft mayo contains less fat than regular mayonnaise and is 45 calories per serving. For the best results, refrigerate our 30 ounce jar of mayo after opening. If you love Kraft Avocado Oil Mayonnaise try our real mayo and olive oil mayonnaise varieties.

name: Chosen Foods Avocado Oil-Based Caesar Dressing and Marinade, Keto Diet Friendly, Gluten & Dairy Free, Low-Carb Sauce (8 oz)
short_description: COLD WEATHER WARNING: Our Mayos and Dressings are at risk of natural separation if exposed to freezing temperatures during transit. While safe to eat, it may not look or taste as intended. You may wish to delay ordering until temperatures are warmer.

Avocado-Oil Based Caesar Dressing: Creamy, garlicky, and tangy. With lemon juice, garlic, dijon mustard, coarse black pepper, distilled vinegar, and a dash of sea salt, this classic blend is tied together in a beautiful base of pure avocado oil.
100% Pure: Chosen Foods Avocado-Oil Based Caesar Dressing is 100% avocado oil-based, never diluted, delicious, and full of good fats from avocados ripened to perfection.

Good Fats from Avocados: At Chosen Foods we are all-in on avocados! A wholesome, delicious superfood. Avocados are one of the world’s most nourishing nutrient-packed foods, thanks to its antioxidants from Vitamin E and monosaturated fats.

Versatile: Toss with your favorite organic greens for an instantly delicious salad, dip your favorite veggies for a healthy snack, or use as a natural marinade on chicken, shrimp or tofu for an effortlessly healthy dinner.

Naturally Refined: Our avocado oil-based dressing is naturally refined and delicious with no added sugar for a healthy eating lifestyle, as well as low-carb and Keto friendly. Certified non-GMO, gluten free, and canola oil free.

name: Foraging Fox Avocado and Lemon Mayonnaise 9.2fl oz single unit
short_description: CERTIFIED NON-GMO - The Foraging Fox Avocado & Lemon Mayo is made with the highest quality, Non-GMO ingredients.
ZINGY TASTE - The sublime blend of avocado oil with high oleic sunflower oil creates a light, zesty mayonnaise with a subtle citrus tang that tastes so fresh you’ll use it on, with and in everything!
NO ADDED SUGAR - A no-added sugar mayonnaise that is also gluten free, low in sodium and is certified Keto. We don’t use any artificial ingredients, colors or preservatives in our Mayos.

BEST-SELLER - The No.1 best selling flavored Mayonnaise in the UK and now we all know why! Its versatility means you can eat it cold with salads, in sandwiches or as a dip or try it with hot food like chicken tenders, add to your burgers or simply let it be the perfect accompaniment to your fries.
COLD WEATHER WARNING: During the winter, condiments can freeze in transit. While safe to eat, it will not look or taste appealing. You may wish to delay ordering until temperatures are warmer.
product_description: Our Avocado & Lemon Mayo strikes the perfect balance between the rich silkiness of avocado and the fresh zing of lemon. Use it as the perfect base to a potato salad, slathered on your sandwich or any way you choose to FOX IT UP!
